hymn.title: Lord Jesus, gladly do our lips express
hymn.category: Praise of the Lord—Satisfaction with Him

layout.singingstanza: Lord Je -- sus, glad -- ly do our lips ex -- press Our heart's deep sense of all Thy worth -- i -- ness; Thou ris -- en One, the Ho -- ly and the True, We give Thee now the praise so just -- ly due.

lyrics.stanza: Lord Jesus, gladly do our lips express Our heart's deep sense of all Thy worthiness; Thou risen One, the Holy and the True, We give Thee now the praise so justly due.
Thou wast alone, till like the precious grain In death Thou layest, but didst rise again; And in Thy risen life a countless host Are "all of one" with Thee, Thy joy and boast.
